learning.supervised.evaluation

Class ClassificationEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.evaluation.ClassificationEstimator

  • public class ClassificationEstimator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the methods for classification prediction quality estimation in terms of accuracy, precision, recall, f1-score and the Matthews correlation coefficient. It calculates all these measures based on the confusion matrix. In the confusion matrix, the element i,j denotes the (average) number of points that were classified as i despite being of class j.

      • appendMainPointsStDevsToFile

        public static void appendMainPointsStDevsToFile(ClassificationEstimator[] estimators,
                                java.io.File outFile)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method prints the stDevs of the main stats in the array of classification estimators to a file, which is usually done when persisting the average results of cross-validation.
        Parameters:
        estimators - ClassificationEstimator[] array of classification estimator objects to persist the average main stats StDevs of.
        outFile - File to persist the data to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
